original_text: When he brought me there, behold, there was a man whose appearance was like bronze, with a linen cord and a measuring reed in his hand. And he was standing in the gateway.
korean_text: 나를 데리시고 거기에 이르시니 모양이 놋 같이 빛난 사람 하나가 손에 삼줄과 측량하는 장대를 가지고 문에 서 있더니

sentences.original_text: with a linen cord and a measuring reed in his hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 손에는 아마실 줄과 측량하는 갈대를 들고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: And he was standing in the gateway.
